sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react" import { IconButton, Avatar, Box, CloseButton, Flex, Stack, HStack, Grid, Button, Image, Heading, } from "@chakra-ui/react" import Webcam from "react-webcam" import { RiUserAddLine } from "react-icons/ri" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { IconType } from "react-icons" const Atendimento = () => { const webcamRef = React.useRef(null) const images = [] const capture = React.useCallback(() => { console.log("err", images) const imageSrc = webcamRef.current?.getScreenshot() images.push(imageSrc) }, [webcamRef]) return ( Paciente: {images.map((img) => ( ))} ) } export default Atendimento
